values.description: Market on open (MOO) orders fill at the official opening auction price for a security. Market that operate 24/7 don't support MOO orders.
values.keywords: Market on open orders, MOO orders, official opening auction price, order properties, order fill modeling, order tickets, buying power buffer, daily price gaps, update orders
